titleStmt.title: A letter from a gentleman in the country to his friend in the city, touching Sir William Petty's posthumous treatise entituled, Verbum sapienti, or, The method of raising taxes in the most equal manner, &c.
titleStmt.author: H. J., Gentleman in the country.
